description: Situated in the heart of the historic centre just a stone’s throw from Piombino’s former Medici fortress, this quiet restaurant boasts a backdrop of exposed stonework and vaulted ceilings and just a few tables, so booking ahead is recommended. Here, the enthusiastic and talented owner-chef serves traditional cuisine reinterpreted with a modern and highly individual twist.
